it.polimi.se2018.client.network.rmi

Class RmiHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.se2018.client.network.rmi.RmiHandler
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ClientInterface

    public class RmiHandler
extends java.lang.Object
implements ClientInterface
    Class Rmi Handler: represents the connection link between the client and the server,the rmi handler is responsible to take the input provided by the client and try to invoke the remote method on the server stub using the rmi middleware technologies for the communication. It creates the connection with the server loading the settings from file
    Author:
    fadda-miceli-mundo
    See Also:
    ClientInterface

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private java.util.logging.Logger log 
      private Ping ping 
      private RmiServerInterface stub 
      private View view 

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      RmiHandler(View view, Ping ping)
      Class constructor responsible of the creation of a new Rmi Handler, load its settings from a json file (ip address), connect the client to the rmi serve interface (stub) and register the rmi client on it

    • Constructor Detail

      • RmiHandler

        public RmiHandler(View view,
                  Ping ping)
        Class constructor responsible of the creation of a new Rmi Handler, load its settings from a json file (ip address), connect the client to the rmi serve interface (stub) and register the rmi client on it
        Parameters:
        view - associated with the rmi handler
        ping - the thread to understand if the client is disconnected from the game
